      • getTranslationFromDicitonary

        public static java.lang.String getTranslationFromDicitonary(java.lang.String languageID,
                                                            java.lang.String originalText,
                                                            Translation.GetTranslationModeIfNotFound mode)
                                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Get translated text from dictionary by Language code
        Parameters:
        languageID - Language code (1033 for example)
        originalText - Text that must be translated
        mode - Mode of working when no value not found
        Returns:
        Translated text
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if "Exception" mode was selected and no values was found
